author: Source: Press & Sun-Bulletin
title: These 7 apps are among the worst at protecting privacy - Press & Sun-Bulletin
text:
These 7 apps are among the worst at protecting privacy Think twice before downloading these apps if you want to protect yourself. Check out this story on pressconnects.com: http://usat.ly/1F6iNS6 When you're browsing through the millions of apps available from the Apple and Android app stores, you'll notice that close to 98% of them are free to download.
 Press & Sun-Bulletin.
